title: Typecon: rides from Socal?
content:
Hey, I'm looking for a ride to Typecon from the Los Angeles area. I'll contribute for expenses and such...   
   
Is Hrant still renting a bus?

 [‹ Inspiration needed...](http://web.archive.org/web/20071024181150/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5523 "Go to previous forum topic") [Tattoo font... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071024181150/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5432 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Jonathan Clede

comments.content: I would have been up for a carpool but I'm gonna see some friends in Sacramento for a couple days on my way up to SF. Even if there is or isn't a SoCal-carpool we should at least all meet up once we're up there...it'd be nice to know more local-ish typophiles.
so... no rides for me? I'll have to take Greyhound...

Jonathan, I can't help you with a ride as I am flying from Oregon, but I saw that JetBlue flies from Long Beach to Oakland for $122 RT, and United and Southwest are both $144RT from LAX to Oakland... $105 RT on Amtrak from LA to SF Union Square... for what it's worth! I know the bus is a bit cheaper, but... well... maybe someone else will chime in about a ride... what days are you planning to travel?
